category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 21 (Composition of the Board of Directors)
contents: Article 21 (Composition of the Board of Directors) ① The Board of Directors shall be composed of the directors specified in Article 23 (2) of the Articles of Incorporation. ② The director under Article 26, Paragraph 4 of the Articles of Incorporation shall be the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the President of the Korea Sports Council) from among those recommended by member sports organizations (hereinafter referred to as *Olympic Sports Organizations) that have joined the International Federation of Olympic Sports Sports in accordance with the following items. Appointed at the general meeting upon recommendation. 1. The relevant organization recommends in writing (including electronic documents) to the Korean Sports Council among its directors (including the chairman and vice-chairman). 2. The sports president recommends to the general meeting that no more than two representatives from the same event be included. ③ During the by-election of directors pursuant to Article 26, Paragraph 4 of the Articles of Incorporation, the board of directors shall appoint a person recommended by the president of the Sports Council from among the directors of Olympic sports organizations (including the president and vice president). [Previous Article 20 is moved to Article 21 on October 6, 2021. ]
